review.comment:
I had my appointment with Iman which was both professional and informative
She was very professional gentle and very patient
I would definitely recommend her and would not hesitate to use her again

I went to see Dr Iman last week for an emergency visit. She'd kindly waited for me in her office despite the late hour. My tooth had unfortunately split and two days later I had a tooth extraction with her. As she was very busy, she did this by opening her practice earlier than usual for me. Very kind, caring and professional. Thank you so much!

I had a wisdom tooth that two other private practice wouldbt take out. But this surgery took it out with ease and ZERO pain. Cant thank the doctor and nurse enough and could not recommend enough how amazing their team is.
Thanks so much again

Considering i was on a tight schedule, Dr. Iman managed to fit me in and perform the treatment quick and efficiently. This was my first time at the practice and I am really happy with the results. I will definitely be back for future appointments and would highly recommend others to do so as-well.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review and we're so happy that you're pleased with the results from your treatment

review.comment: professional advice , friendly people , reasonable price I can recommend this place
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words and review, we look forwards to seeing you again soon!

review.comment:
Called in today on the off chance of an appointment, I received excellent service from the practitioner and staff very friendly ... great advice, also had some first class treatment and a follow up appointment.
I would definitely recommend.
review.review_reply: Hi Geoff, thank you for your kind words and leaving such a great review! We look forwards to seeing you again soon!

review.comment: The new female dentist, was so nice. I am normally very nervous, but the she was very professional and calm. I recieved really good treatment and was really happy with how it went.
review.review_reply: Thanks for leaving us such a great review! We're so pleased at how happy you are with your treatment and can't wait to see you again soon!

review.comment: Never had a problem with the male dentist there before but as soon as I changed to the new lady dentist around a couple of months ago I’ve been having constant problems with my teeth. Also, she is very rude and very unprofessional. Since left the practice and wouldn’t recommend her.
review.review_reply:
Hi there! The dental practice is under new management and ownership with a whole new team as well. We would love to hear more about your past experience so that we can improve wherever possible and would be very happy to see you for a check up or to address any concerns you might have about your teeth. Please get in touch with us by calling 02920220794.

Thanks,

Perlau Gwyn Dental Care

review.comment: All staff very friendly and both dentists highly professional - I would recommend
